title: Triangle Tavern
description: Serves meat, veg options available. South Philly Italian gastropub, opened in 1933, has clearly marked vegan items, including vegetable antipasta, house salad, polenta fries, buffalo seitan wings, vegan meatball sandwich and many more. Located in the historic Italian Market. Owners also own vegan-friendly Khyber Pass Pub, Royal Tavern, Los Caballitos and Dos Segundos.
